FunctionLevelAnalysis.buy: Handles the purchase of tokens and checks the exact ether sent for the number of tokens.
FunctionLevelAnalysis.sell: Manages the sale of tokens and verifies user balance and transfer amount.
FunctionLevelAnalysis.isComplete: Returns true if the contractâ€™s balance is below 1 ether, indicating the challenge is complete.

DecisionPoints.Purpose: Ensures the user sent the exact amount of ether required for the requested tokens.
Confirms the user has enough tokens to sell.

StateTransitionPoints.Updates: balanceOf[msg.sender] is incremented based on numTokens purchased.
balanceOf[msg.sender] is decremented by the number of tokens sold; ether is transferred.
